name: Web Pixel World 2
description:
Web Pixel World 2 is finally here for iOS! This is a sequel to the fun running sensation game called "Web Pixel World." 

3D HERO Platformer Game at its best ! Full detailed & interactive world, you can even push hidden boxes to spawn power jumps throughout 3D world.

On screen controls to make your 3D Hero to anything including walk, run, & even jump!

Fully Detailed 3D World !

Newest 2020 3D Heroic Platformer Game on the store!

Completely NO in app purchases !

"This game is not affiliated with Minecraft and Mojang AB or Marvel"
